storyInfo: To force the Radiant Knight to surrender, the Armorless Union has kidnapped Maria, only for her to be rescued by the Infected knights. In the Arena, Margaret triumphs over the Radiant Knight, but the Infected's ire can no longer be contained.

attributes.text: Viviana Droste. That's your name.
You are the shame of the family. If other nobles find out about you, you will become their weapon, used to attack your father.
You should have been exiled in secret or killed outright. The spire should never have heard your cries.
Yet you were brought here to Kazimierz. You were entrusted to a Kazimierz campaign knight to raise.
Your identity should have stayed hidden, but there is nobody here to hide your identity.
It's as though everyone wanted you to live out in the open, unconcealed.
How respectable yet sorrowful... Your noble father... Your nameless mother... They both love you so.

attributes.content: Ngh...
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Candle-flame... and shadows.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: What a surprise... You seem to have a good inductive reasoning of Arts phenomena.
attributes.name: Candle Knight

attributes.content: When a room is illuminated by only a single candle, the candlelight will naturally draw our attention more so than anything else. Yet it is the shadows of everything around that truly engulf us.
attributes.name: Candle Knight

attributes.content: Impressive techniques, Viviana... Not even my light... can shine upon you.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Please allow me to apologize.
attributes.name: Candle Knight

attributes.content: What...?
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Out of courtesy, I should call you by your name too, Miss Margaret.
attributes.name: Candle Knight

attributes.content: Is... Is this really the a knight competition?!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: It looks like neither of the knights are in a rush to slaughter her opponent for a win. On the contrary, you could say this scene is like an elegant aristocratic social gathering!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: B-But even so—Did you see those Arts?! The Candle Knight's lightning-quick swordhand! Did it just engulf all that light?!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Is the Radiant Knight's endless radiance starting to wear thin?!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Just a small candle-flame—That's right, it's just a tiny candlelight, but check out its surroundings! The flame is engulfed by the darkness around, and it's that unlit darkness, not the candle's light, that's drawing our attention!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Rather than that tiny glow, you could say the Candle Knight is controlling the shadows underneath that light!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Gotta hand it to them! This isn't something you often see in our matches, not even the finals!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Their Arts are calm and elegant, but there's no mistake that these Arts are of the highest caliber!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: That's the Radiant Knight, Margaret Nearl, and the Candle Knight, Viviana Droste, we know and love!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Maria? Maria!
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Where is she...? She's not at the bar, and she's not home...
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: No...
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Nnf... nnf...!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Why am I...?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: You...? You're that...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: The Armorless Union.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Oh, calm down.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: As long as you promise you won't make a fuss, we won't do anything to you.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: After all, if the Nearl family's precious little baby got hurt... the Radiant Knight and Młynar wouldn't just sit around and not do anything.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: You want to... make Margaret forfeit?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Something like that.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Do you know what happened to Brassrust? The Infected are the talk of the town right now.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Could you imagine what would happen if, under these circumstances, the Radiant Knight ends up taking the crown?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Your sister just has to be a good girl and let the Candle Knight win. That will save us all the headache. Pretty simple, don't you agree?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Margaret isn't going to forfeit.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Did you know, Maria Nearl?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Kazimierz... is like a tower. If you stand at its base and look up at the top of the spiraling staircase, you will never, ever see its end.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: V! Kowal! Marcin!
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Maria might've been—
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: What happened to Maria?!
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.text: I have wondered for a long, long time.
What are we suffering for?
Compared to the farmers of Ursus's barren soil, the refugees escaping Bolívar's flames of war, and the merchants making their way across Sargon's endless golden sands...
Are we not enjoying our lives?
No.
Ursus has nobles living their high lives, Bolívar has war profiteers swimming in money, and Sargon's golden city must be one of the most prosperous metropolises the world has ever seen.
In that case, what is the source of Kazimierz's sufferings? As 'knights,' as Kazimierzian knights, how are we to handle these tragedies hidden from view?
No.
To start, am I really a knight of Kazimierz?
Should I have stayed in Leithania, writing poems and songs amid flowers and accordion melodies?

attributes.content: Why don't you try your hand at writing a few poems? With how popular you are, I can get in touch with a few publishers. Your fame and talent will...
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: Me...? I'm afraid... I can't.
attributes.name: Candle Knight

attributes.content: You're being humble again.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: No, this isn't humility, McKee.
attributes.name: Candle Knight

attributes.text: I might have gone numb.
I thought I had left Leithanien and left that spire behind. It wasn't until afterwards that I realized this. The spire is still there. It has always been there.
It has always stood above all suffering and tribulation.

attributes.content: ...Margaret.
attributes.name: Candle Knight

attributes.content: When you set a tall, magnificent spire ablaze, how far away can the masses see the smoke?
attributes.name: Candle Knight

attributes.content: Flames cannot burn away the contradictions in their hearts.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: The masses can see the black smoke from far, far away, but it may once have been their homes, the lands on which they survived.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: In that case... I truly don't understand.
attributes.name: Candle Knight

attributes.content: How does a knight like you return to Kazimierz, if not for a change of heart? What is your objective?
attributes.name: Candle Knight

attributes.content: It's just as you said, Viviana.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: The times are changing, but that does not mean what we once considered virtuous and righteous must change.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: I came back because I must remind the knights of Kazimierz... as well as all those who are here in this country—
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: —I'm here to remind them of their long forgotten glory.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Remind? How will you... remind Kazimierz of anything, given its current state?
attributes.name: Candle Knight

attributes.content: You want an answer from me... but I'm afraid I don't necessarily have that right. This isn't something that can be done through simple conversation.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: My... You can read minds with your Arts?
attributes.name: Candle Knight

attributes.content: I'm only grasping more and more of your honesty by the minute.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Also, you asked me what I saw in my years of exile.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: I've witnessed... the greatest tragedy this world has seen.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: I've seen the Infected's struggles at death's door, I've seen great cities crumble and fall as Catastrophes rained down upon them.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Is that the suffering you've seen...? In this world that you pity...?
attributes.name: Candle Knight

attributes.content: I have excellent companions.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: No... excellent doesn't adequately describe them anymore. They... possess a brilliant shine, a testament to their ideals.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: It's true. I was once lost, Viviana.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Anyone would be lost if they had taken the crown and been exiled at your age.
attributes.name: Candle Knight

attributes.content: But things are different now. At the end of my long journey, I found friends whom I can trust. I realized where my beliefs lie.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: I'm alone no longer.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Margaret lodges her longsword into the ground.
Without a sound, the knight's radiance emanates throughout the arena, with gold seemingly flowing through her eyes.
She will be the lighthouse and foundation of everything here.
She will stand solemnly in this place till she ceases, perhaps even till the end of times.
Even if no one has walked the path she alone illuminates—
—There is nothing to fear any more.
Report. Platinum, ma'am... We've already informed the Knights Association.
attributes.name: An Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: However, the match is still ongoing.
attributes.name: An Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: I sure wish the Knights Association would get on with this already. Otherwise, her sister's going to have to suffer.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: I told you. Margaret isn't going to forfeit.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: No biggie. I'm sure she won't be in any mood for her next match when she sees your fingers laid out side by side at your family's front door.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Look at your eyes... So defiant. You're a weird one. No, both you and your sister are weird.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: You may come from a famous line of heroes, but do you know how many lackeys the General Chamber has here in the Grand Knight Territory?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: So you have the Radiant Knight and Młynar. The two of them together might put up a little fight, but what can they really do? Can they really take on the thousands of assassins here in the GKT and escape legal liability?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: I don't remember you being such a talkative gal... Are you nervous?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Maybe.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: I mean, before, all I had to do was draw my bowstring, aim, and let go. Then, my target would die after a quick flash of pain.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: These orders I've been getting, though? Not only do I have to go after kids now, I also have to arm wrestle with the Radiant Knight. *Sigh*... Work sucks.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: The Armorless Union's really gone to hell lately, hasn't it?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Report!
attributes.name: An Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: Did the Radiant Knight give up?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: No, it's just... E7 and E9 didn't answer during the regular check-in just now...
attributes.name: An Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: Why are you standing there, then? Get ready to fight.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: All units, deploy immediately. Secure vantage points A1 and A2. Do not give the target a chance to escape.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Numbers three and four, cover me. We'll deal with the infiltrators.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: (An explosion? They aren't the least bit worried about the hostage, are they—?)
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: (—No, that's not right. They're not here to rescue Maria.)
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Hostiles in the smoke! Watch for attacks—
attributes.name: An Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: Nngh–...
attributes.name: An Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: (Loud clicking noises)
attributes.name: 'Justice Knight'

attributes.content: What's this...? A delivery cart?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Well, hello, Armorless lackeys.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Grr... Infected knights, huh...?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Whoa, huge backflip. Look at that distance. You're a nimble one—Hm?
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Maria Nearl? What are you doing here?
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: It's... it's you...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Hey, can you move?
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Y-Yes!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: I don't know what's going on, but I ain't about to complain if this means the Radiant Knight's gonna owe me a favor.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Let's get this out of the way first. It's a serious crime to assault the Armorless Union. Haha, not in the legal sense, but whatever.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: You can run away if you want, or—
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: —If I don't stop them here, they will keep going after my sister.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Whew, not a bit of hesitation. I'm starting to like you.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Too bad, though. I'm not gonna have it on my conscience to drag anybody into our fight against the Armorless. Besides, I get the feeling Sona's pretty fond of you. You'll have to do this another time!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Toland!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: W-What?
attributes.name: An Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: Huh? Who are you?!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Come with me, will you, Young Lady Nearl? Oh, and by the by? You and your uncle are nothing alike.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: Report to the Adeptus Sprawiedliwi... It's confirmed. The Armorless Union and the Infected knights' skirmish has begun. Maria Nearl's been taken away too.
attributes.name: A Kazimierz Knight

attributes.content: It will do as long as the Radiant Knight's match goes uninterrupted. Over.
attributes.name: A Kazimierz Knight

attributes.content: How long has it been since the match started? No one in the arena today has ever seen two knights duel like this!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Even Arts laymen can tell right away theirs are on another level!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: This is a battle of lights! There's no doubt this has become the theme of this match! A weak candlelight versus a full-blown radiance!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Up till 9 o'clock, we've had two million viewers watching this match via the intercity net and other means!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: For the first time since the 22nd Major, when the Radiant Knight took her title, we've broken the highest concurrent viewer record! There are countless viewers watching Margaret's heroics right this moment!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Ah, what a shame! I wish we lived in one of those sci-fi novels where fans from all the other countries could watch this match live—Ahhh!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: The giant rays of light clash again—How blindingly bright! But amidst the rolling waves of light—That's right! The Candle Knight remains unscathed!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Phew...
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Brilliant... Viviana.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: With light and shadows... you weaved an untreadable swath of land.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: I am honored that my little candle-flame could hold the Radiant Knight down for so long.
attributes.name: Candle Knight

attributes.content: But you don't seem to be giving it your all. Are you perhaps worried about your family?
attributes.name: Candle Knight

attributes.content: What are you doing is contradictory, Margaret.
attributes.name: Candle Knight

attributes.content: You take pride in having such wonderful companions, but the course that you have charted for yourself... will cause you to leave your friends behind.
attributes.name: Candle Knight

attributes.content: Perhaps one day, your sister will meet her fate in one of the Armorless Union's conspiracies, and the General Chamber will stand in your way, wherever you will be.
attributes.name: Candle Knight

attributes.content: Viviana.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: When the knight charged toward the endless waves, did you imagine that he was trying to overcome the entire world?
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Ahh, so you are familiar with that knight legend.
attributes.name: Candle Knight

attributes.content: My sister's a big fan of the book.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Centaurea's been ambushed by the Infected. It was Wild Mane.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: If she can't take care of the likes of Wild Mane, then she should hand in her resignation already.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: That said... What should we do? The K.G.C.C. made it clear they want the Infected dealt with... and as soon as possible.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: Hmm... They are quite a pain in the rear... but we need them to keep stirring up a ruckus for us...
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: You're our star performer. It's your call.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: Oh? Was that a compliment? You know, I've always thought that I look kinda like some star out there, ever since I dyed my hair blue.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Okay, okay, stop glaring at me like that. It's very simple. Kill a few of them, and as cruelly as possible, too. Spread the fear.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: The ones left behind will come to hate Kazimierz and the K.G.C.C. even more, and things will only get more intense.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: So?
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: Eh, so, let's dump all the troublesome mess on our little Platinum.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Let's kill some Infected. The ones who aren't knights or in the limelight. Just the perfect amount of cruelty, like we're hunting them down.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: ...Huff...
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: I see, so the moment your candle goes out is when you actually start casting.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Even a brief moment of darkness is enough to swallow my Arts whole. In that case, perhaps you can engulf the entire arena's light with each flicker of your candle's flame?
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Impressive observation. There has never been a knight who saw through my Arts during a duel. Is this the result of your years-long exile?
attributes.name: Candle Knight

attributes.content: Too bad, then. It seems I have yet to truly make contact with you.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: I used to hate Arts more so than anything. The more outstanding my Arts are, the more I am reminded of my upbringing—
attributes.name: Candle Knight

attributes.content: And the more I come to realize... the situation I am in.
attributes.name: Candle Knight

attributes.content: Tell me, Margaret Nearl, the Radiant Knight. Each and every knight who keeps the faith feels particularly curious about you.
attributes.name: Candle Knight

attributes.content: Tell me your answer. Your answer of what it means to be a knight.
attributes.name: Candle Knight

attributes.content: —Both the Radiant Knight and the Candle Knight have stopped. They're cautiously sizing each other up, taking a stroll around the arena—
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: What's the matter? Is this a tea party to the two of them? Are the two knights going to share a dance together after all that careful probing?
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Hoh, did you hear that? He said we could dance.
attributes.name: Candle Knight

attributes.content: Please, then.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Like the gentle morning sun, her beaming radiance begins to extend its reach toward the candle-lit darkness.
Soon after, the light begins to flood the entire arena.
Kawalerielki tonight is as brilliant as any bright, clear day.
The Nearl girl went this way, didn't she? Quick, find her!
attributes.name: An Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: —There's no one here!
attributes.name: An Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: How can that be?! This place's listed in her file! It's Tremoriron Knight's bar!
attributes.name: An Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: Check if there's an attic or an exit out back—
attributes.name: An Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: Misters, I'm afraid we're not open right now.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Don't you dare!
attributes.name: An Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: Erk...
attributes.name: An Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: Don't you kill them, V. Not unless you want shit to really hit the fan.
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: Hah, how about you have a guess at how many artillery casters I captured during the war all those years ago to earn my military honors?
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Son of a...! How dare you?! We're—
attributes.name: An Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: The Armorless Union? How about before that? Were you a robber? A bounty hunter? A veteran, or perhaps a down and out knight?
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Let me tell you. We aren't scared of you.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: You dare cross the Union even once, the Union will hunt you to the ends of the world.
attributes.name: An Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: It might happen today... maybe tomorrow. It might happen when you're eating, when you're asleep, or when you're spreading marmalade on your toast... You'll have nowhere to run!
attributes.name: An Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: Thanks for the advice. *Spit*.
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: To be honest, though, the Armorless ain't nearly as scary as the vanguards.
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Hah! I haven't felt as good as this in years!
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Looks like their buddies are on to this... Sorry, Marcin, but that might be it for your shop.
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: Oh, that's too bad. I paid two years' worth of rent upfront.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: You! What have you done?!
attributes.name: An Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: You dare resist—Form up, ready your crossbows—Uh?
attributes.name: An Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: The Armorless points his crossbow forward.
The bowstring has snapped. More accurately, it is being twisted.
W-What?
attributes.name: An Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: Take this!
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: Ugh?!
attributes.name: An Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: It's been a while since I used any Arts... Guess I've gotten rusty.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Hmph, since when did the Armorless have this many men?! The K.G.C.C.'s got too much money to throw around, huh?
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Hah, that's why we wiped the floor with all of them!
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: Watch out! The bald guy's Tremoriron Marcin, and the other two are campaign knights!
attributes.name: An Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: Keep two squads here. Keep them alive. They will be our trump card against Nearl. The rest of you, find Maria—
attributes.name: An Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: Hey, this isn't looking good, V!
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: You want to try begging for mercy, then?
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Ready, fire—
attributes.name: An Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: What? Who is it this time?!
attributes.name: An Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: You...
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: What have you done to Maria?!
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Radiance. The word 'radiance' is starting to be wear on everyone in the arena.
The sun-like prismatic colors dye the area behind the Radiant Knight. Standing opposite her is a small candlelight that has lit anew.
Then, right when the audience is starting to grow tired of finding the two knights in the blinding glow...
The faint sphere—Its rays, its halos, and all its light blink away.
*Pant*... *pant*...
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Viviana... You are truly impressive...
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Look, my light... have been swallowed whole... *Pant*.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: I'm honored to have exhausted the Radiant Knight.
attributes.name: Candle Knight

attributes.content: But it seems you rely on more than just your dazzling Arts.
attributes.name: Candle Knight

attributes.content: With her Candle Sword held up high, the Candle Knight begins to steadily lower her blade.
The candle's flame has extinguished, leaving behind a glistening brilliance on its milk white cross section.
The candle, now halved, flutters down toward the earth like a feather.
You've broken my blade. It seems I have lost.
attributes.name: Candle Knight

attributes.content: I, The Candle Knight, Viviana Droste, admit defeat.
attributes.name: Candle Knight

attributes.content: The Candle Knight has conceded! I didn't hear that wrong, did I—? The Candle Knight has just accepted defeat! The committee has confirmed her request. So there you have it—
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: After this excruciating, protracted duel, the winner is our young legend, the Radiant Knight!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: The Radiant Knight, suddenly returned from exile, has defeated her first Grand Knight opponent after an extraordinary match of the highest level!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: The Candle Knight may have suffered defeat, but there is no doubt she is basking in glory! The two knights are shaking hands and trading salutes! Take a good look! This scene is going to be all over the headlines the next couple weeks!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: What?! The Candle Knight lost?! That's a couple months' paychecks down the drain!
attributes.name: A Spectating Knight

attributes.content: Serves you right for not listening to me... Not that I earned much myself, but well... *Sigh*... This match's probably giving me some kind of eye disease down the line.
attributes.name: A Cheering Knight

attributes.content: Hnnf...
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: To be a knight is to be the noble light that illuminates the land...
attributes.name: Candle Knight

attributes.content: Hmm...
attributes.name: Candle Knight

attributes.content: Viviana.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: I won't comment on your background—and that matter that weighs on your mind. However, you are among the strongest knights I have ever met.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: That is more than enough.
attributes.name: Candle Knight

attributes.content: In the classic knight tales... the knights always opened their hearts to each other by crossing swords.
attributes.name: Candle Knight

attributes.content: Reality has proven to be less romantic. Though I've only just met you today, Margaret.
attributes.name: Candle Knight

attributes.content: Show me how far you will go.
attributes.name: Candle Knight

attributes.content: I'm looking forward to seeing.
attributes.name: Candle Knight

attributes.content: Tch—
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: (—I managed to block that strike, but I still almost lost my grip on my weapon—She's tough—)
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: My next shot will pierce through your legs. You won't be able to run anymore.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: The next shot after that will pierce through your armor.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: The final shot will blow right through your chest. You'll struggle in agony for a moment, before dying in the dirty, wet street.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Hah... No wonder Sona told me to run as soon as I ran into an Armorless elite.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: You've really hit it big for someone your age. Bet the people higher up the ladder there are some serious monsters, eh?
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: You'd better pray you never find out—Hm?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Wild Mane! We'll cover you! Get out of here!
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: (Hurried beeping noises)
attributes.name: 'Justice Knight'

attributes.content: Alright, Justice, if that's what you say. Today's not the day for us to settle the score with the Armorless anyway.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: See you next time, Platinum!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: *cough*, *cough* *cough*...
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: She's gone.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: What's her deal with explosives...?! *Cough*, there's ash everywhere... and I just washed my hair.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: *Sigh*... How am I supposed to explain this...?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: No need to explain anything.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: We saw all that.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: A fair number of the Infected just now are part of the Pinus Sylvestris.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: They banded the Infected together fairly quickly. Since when has the Grand Knight Territory had this many Infected?
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: If we have to play the blame game, I guess that's on both the sloppy engineering contractors and the Catastrophes.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: That's why we need Area 0 to do its job... Oh.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Little pegasus? I have a favor to ask you.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Ask away... I just screwed up in front of my bosses. I'm not about to object.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Will you investigate this company for us? They have dealings with the Radiant Knight, and they are in Area 0 right now.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: We'll take over this whole thing about the Infected... And this company has to do with the Radiant Knight anyway. I'd say it falls under your purview.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: I just need to investigate?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: They were even gung-ho enough to get in touch with the General Chamber. Man, it looks like this foreign company is extra greedy.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: If they prove beneficial to us, then they can do whatever they want. I'll even be okay if they end up solving the Radiant Knight problem with money.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: But this whole affair is up to the Board of Directors. Somebody there will come looking for you soon. No need to worry about what we think.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: What will you two do, then?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Since when have you had the right to question the Lazurites' business?
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: I... I wouldn't dare.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Now do your job.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: It's the Candle Knight! Please sign this for me!
attributes.name: An Audience Member A

attributes.content: Candle Knight! Look this way, please! Ah—!
attributes.name: An Audience Member B

attributes.content: You look like you're in a good mood.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: Did you know, McKee?
attributes.name: Candle Knight

attributes.content: I heard that the Radiant Knight's legend as the youngest ever champion ended with her exile.
attributes.name: Candle Knight

attributes.content: She was infected and then exiled, but it wasn't until I met her six years later that I realized this: They are all tall tales.
attributes.name: Candle Knight

attributes.content: Just now...
attributes.name: Candle Knight

attributes.content: ...she was as radiant as the sun at high noon.
attributes.name: Candle Knight

attributes.content: Phew... That was a pleasant meeting, Dr. {@nickname}.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: I'm sure you've gained the favor of the top brass. Those were all key members of the General Chamber of Commerce.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.options: Thank you very much. This is all thanks to you.;......;I learned quite a few things.

attributes.content: But my guess is... You are seeking more than just a mutual relationship on paper, right?
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: I'm curious... are there many researchers familiar with the battlefields of commerce in other countries?
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.options: Perhaps...;Society is changing. It's a necessity.;I might just be one-of-a-kind.

attributes.content: Haha...
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Your hotel isn't much further.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Oh, this is pretty close to where I got my first job. Back then, I was just your average trader—
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Urghh—
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: —! Step back, Doctor!
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: An Infected knight, injured from unknown causes, turns to your face with a stupefied look.
You can tell that there is not a hint of anger, fear, or sorrow in this man.
But you have not had the chance to truly analyze his complex emotions. Right now, he is like a burdenbeast being flogged.
The man strenuously climbs to his feet and runs away.
Mr. Spokesman, this is...?
attributes.name: An Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: Who was that just now?
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: An illegal Infected. If you would like, we can send you the documents later.
attributes.name: An Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: I apologize. Even though you are a spokesman, I can't divulge more when there is an outsider in your presence.
attributes.name: An Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: Please take your friend and evacuate immediately. There's been a confrontation in the neighborhood.
attributes.name: An Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: My apologies. I hope that didn't dampen your spirits.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: I didn't expect we would run into trouble like that after the banquet...
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: I'm afraid I don't have that power...
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.options: For our friendship.;For your friendship with Rhodes Island.;For the betterment of Kazimierz.

attributes.content: Malkiewicz looks silently in the direction the Infected knight ran away.
There is a small alleyway, from which he can hear music playing and see waves of heat wafting out of a midnight diner.
The knight's blood trail extends into the distance.
Like gemstones sparkling with humanity.
